name: SecOps Response Agent
description: Executes automated response actions based on security investigation outcomes (e.g., create ticket, block IP).

authSchemes.description: No authentication required for this internal POC agent.

skills.name: Execute Security Response Action
skills.description: Takes a defined action type and parameters, executes the corresponding response (e.g., create Jira ticket).

action_type.description: The type of response action to execute.

parameters.description: Parameters specific to the action type (e.g., ticket summary/description, IP address).

details.description: Optional details, e.g., created ticket ID or error message.
